title: Understanding Diversity in Medical Education Through Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and General Understanding of Social Diversity
context.additional_context: Emphasizes teamwork and social interaction skills in multicultural simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers from diverse backgrounds in VR simulations to solve medical problems with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose at least three role allocation and conflict management strategies within teams by applying Social Interdependence Theory.
Learners can create at least two instructional design improvements that address the needs of minority learners in medical education settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
